email_subject: Re: quotes for gas hedge for SMUD
email_body: i filled in the spreadsheet From: Gary Taylor 09/14/2000 05:24 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: quotes for gas hedge for SMUD John, Please keep in mind that the option we are looking for is the average of the daily Gas Daily Henry Hub settles from 2/1 - 8/31. If you have any questions, please call me at x31511. Regards, Gary
